properties.entry: SELECT M_NO ,M_NAME ,M_ID ,M_NICKNAME ,M_PWD ,M_RRN ,M_PHONE ,M_EMAIL ,M_ADDRESS ,M_DATE ,M_MODIFY ,M_STATUS ,M_REPORT ,M_GRADE ,M_PROFILE FROM MEMBER WHERE M_ID = ? AND M_PWD = ? AND M_STATUS IN ('A','U')
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE M_STATUS != 'A'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT M_NO ,M_NAME ,M_ID ,M_NICKNAME ,M_PWD ,M_RRN ,M_PHONE ,M_EMAIL ,M_ADDRESS ,M_DATE ,M_MODIFY ,M_STATUS ,M_REPORT ,M_GRADE ,M_PROFILE FROM MEMBER WHERE M_STATUS != 'A'
ORDER BY M_REPORT DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
